Text: LuncheonHey guys Are any of you going to make it to the luncheon for Caycie on Saturday We are trying to get a head count Also Trish is your mom coming See you soon I am excited for this weekend Love Lisa

Caycies PartyHi guys I am so excited about this weekend I cannot wait to see all of you Here are a few reminders about the weekend We are all meeting at Anns house around hopefully we can all get to the restaurant by We are going to Casa Loma they do not take reservations for a party of our size but around I can call and put our names on the list It may be fun to hang out in the bar for awile anyway I think everyone but Emily and Kathryn are going to make it for dinner on Friday night If you are NOT going to make it for dinner please let me know as soon as you can because we dont want to be waiting for you Bring a pillow and blanket if you can There are enough beds to sleep I think Please do not forget to bring your own alcohol for the weekend Also we are going to Salt Lick for dinner on Saturday night make sure to bring whatever you want to drink because the restaurant is BYOB Also it is a CASH ONLY place They will have an ATM there but they will not accept credit cards or checks Also could each of you bring to chip in for the weekend I added up the costs for the weekend maid cake lunch on Sat and it totals about if we all split it the cost is only person Manicures After the lingeree shower we are going to get our nails done at a nail place in town I have these people that are wanting either a manicure andor peticure Abby Jeannie Eddie Becky Ann Susan Lisa if anyone else wants one please email me so I can let the sweet man know who is running the shop Dont forget your swimsuit too I think the weather is going to be wonderful Thank you all for coming I know this means so much to Caycie Here is my cell if you need anything Love Lisa

New InformationSusie I know I am a total dingbat Will you send me all of your information again including parents address parents home phone your work phone etc I just got a new palm so I am updating Love Lisa

This weekendHi guys I have been incredibly disorganized about the rsvps for Caycies party this weekend so if you have already sent it in I am so sorry Please email me back and let me know if you will be there for the Friday night dinner Wimberly and if you want to get a manicurepeticure on Saturday Thanks Love Lisa

Caycies BacheloretteHi girls Caycies Bachelorette is only weeks away I hope all of you got your invitations thank you Bate for doing those If you havent please send me an email I am also assuming that you can all come so if you cant please email me too I wanted to take a poll on something I thought it may be fun to get a manicure andor peticure when we are in Wimberly On Saturday we will probably get up and do Caycies lingere shower around lunch Then it may be fun to look around the town supposedly there is really cute shopping I called a couple of the nail salons in town and the one that I really liked was NV Nails A manicure is and a peticure is if you get both it is He said that if we call ahead he can get a sign that says Bachelorette Party and he can reserve a place for us This could be something that some of us do and some others can stay at Anns house if they did not want to get their nails done What do you guys think Lisa

Hey Susie Dont forget to email me your parents address My mom wants to send you some pictures There is a picture of you me and Bate that is ADORABLE I am going to frame it and it is the one in the driveway o Love you Lisa

ski jackethi susie are you available to meet next week we are headed on the ski trip next friday so maybe can you meet me on monday tuesday we are going to the rodeo and wednesday we have bible study maybe you could come over for dinner we could go walking then you could eat w us yes yes love you lisa

Caycies Bachelorette PartyHello Girls I am getting so excited about Caycies Bachelorette Party I hope everyone has marked their calendars for the weekend of March Ann has graciously offered her house in Wimberly for the weekend What I wanted to find out is when do you think you could come in Would it be more fun for everyone to come to Austin at various times and hang out at Caycies house Then everyone could caravan together to Anns place on Saturday morning Or would it be better for everyone to find their way to Anns at whatever time they can make it on Friday night The tentative plan is for us to have a lingere shower on Saturday during lunch or in the afternoon and then go to Salt Lick on Saturday night for dinner Let me know what you think and what your schedule permits Thanks Lisa
AddressesSusan and Bate Please send me your current addresses I am sending out an invite for a shower for Caycie on Feb nd Thanks Lisa Also send me your home numbers so that I can update my organizer

Jan TastersNancy emailed me about a restaurant that I have not heard of called The Daily Review I looked it up on citysearch and it sounds really good Here is the reivew profile We could either go there this month or we could cook this month the recipe exchange and save it for February What do you think Also are we still thinking that Monday nights are the best They definitely are the best for me provided that we do not have NCL Is everyone free on Jan Jan Lisa

January TastersHey guys Any thoughts on Tasters this month At the Christmas one we talked about having a recipe party where everyone brings their favorite dish and passes out the recipe to everyone Do you want to do that or we could go find a new restaurant See you soon Lisa
New EmailHey guys I have finally updated my email This name change stuff takes forever Hope everyone is doing well Lisa

San Antonio PartiesSusan Here are the directions from Houston to the luncheon Take I West Exit North or West Keep to the right Exit Eisenhauer take a left under highway Keep going for about miles There will be four way stops Vandiver and Greenwich The next light will be N New Braunfels Take a left on N New Braunfels Your th light will be Burr Road Go up to one more light Hildebrand and take a left You are in the club Kitchen Shower Luncheon AM The party that night is at Ann Waltons house and I do not have that address but she can tell you at the luncheon It is a bar shower If you are coming that morning and want to go to the luncheon w us here are the directions to my house After the four way stop at Greenwich take a left at the next street Scotsdale Take a right on Camelback go down the hill Camelback circular drive Home We will leave around for the club Love you Lisa

FWD Womens History MonthI agree I loved this forward Forwarded by Lisa A ThielemannJPMCHASE on PM Elizabeth Edrington uthscsaedu on PM To Deborah Brown Emily Boon HLeecom Jennifer Bowles Jessica Pulliam Kelly Hammonds Lisa A HASE Stephanie Spence Williams cc Subject FWD Womens History Month I normally dont send forwardsbut I thought this was particularly good I think of of us too busy people need to be reminded of the simple things every so often Hope youre all well Elizabeth In honor of womens history month and in memory of Erma Bombeck who lost her fight with cancer IF I HAD MY LIFE TO LIVE OVER by Erma Bombeck written after she found out she was dying from cancer I would have gone to bed when I was sick instead of pretending the earth would go into a holding pattern if I werent there for the day I would have burned the pink candle sculpted like a rose before it melted in storage I would have talked less and listened more I would have invited friends over to dinner even if the carpet was stained or the sofa faded I would have eaten the popcorn in the good living room and worried much less about the dirt when someone wanted to light a fire in the fireplace I would have taken the time to listen to my grandfather ramble about his youth I would have shared more of the responsibility carried by my husband I would never have insisted the car windows be rolled up on a summer day because my hair had just been teased and sprayed I would have sat on the lawn with my children and not worried about grass stains I would have cried and laughed less while watching television and more while watching life I would never have bought anything just because it was practical wouldnt show soil or was guaranteed to last a lifetime Instead of wishing away nine months of pregnancy Id have cherished every moment and realized that the wonderment growing inside me was the only chance in life to assist God in a miracle When my kids kissed me impetuously I would never have said Later Now go get washed up for dinner There would have been more I love yous more Im sorrys But mostly given another shot at life I would seize every minutelook at it and really see it live it and never give it back Stop sweating the small stuff Dont worry about who doesnt like you who has more or whos doing what Instead lets cherish the relationships we have with those who do love us Lets think about what God HAS blessed us with And what we are doing each day to promote ourselves mentally physically emotionally as well as spiritually Life is too short to let it pass you by We only have one shot at this and then its gone Age She looks at herself and sees a Queen Age She looks at herself and sees Cinderella Age She looks at herself and sees an Ugly Sister Mum I cant go to school looking like this Age She looks at herself and sees too fattoo thin too shorttoo tall too straighttoo curly but decides shes going out anyway Age She looks at herself and sees too fattoo thin too shorttoo tall too straighttoo curly but decides she doesnt have time to fix it so shes going out anyway Age She looks at herself and sees too fattoo thin too shorttoo tall too straighttoo curly but says At least I am clean and goes out anyway Age She looks at herself and sees I am and goes wherever she wants to go Age She looks at herself and reminds herself of all the people who cant even see themselves in the mirror anymore Goes out and conquers the world Age She looks at herself sees wisdom laughter and ability goes out and enjoys life Age Doesnt bother to look Just puts on a purple hat and goes out to have fun with the world Send this on to all the women you are grateful to have as friends Maybe we should all grab that purple hat earlier Please send this to five phenomenal women today in celebration of Beautiful Womens Month If you do something good will happen you will boost another womans self esteem
